Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Marlin Stratford in London (Newham), you'll be close to Olympic Stadium and O2 Arena. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Boleyn Ground Stadium and Excel Exhibition Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 111 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include microwaves and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.

Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 10:30 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
This property requires a deposit of £500 to be paid for weekend stays (Friday to Sunday). All other stay dates will be subject to a deposit payment of £200. To complete the reservation process and obtain additional information, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking.

With a stay at Marlin Stratford in London (Newham), you'll be close to Olympic Stadium and O2 Arena. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Boleyn Ground Stadium and Excel Exhibition Centre.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Olympic Stadium - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Boleyn Ground Stadium - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Excel Exhibition Centre - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
London Fields - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
O2 Arena - 5 km / 3.1 mi
South Park - 6.5 km / 4.1 mi
Tower of London - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
The Gherkin - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Tower Bridge - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Cutty Sark - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Barbican Arts Centre - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Royal Exchange - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
London City Hall - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
HMS Belfast - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
London Bridge - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 32.3 km / 20.1 mi
London (STN-Stansted) - 42.3 km / 26.3 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 44.8 km / 27.8 mi

The preferred airport for Marlin Stratford is London (LCY-London City).

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
This property requires a deposit of £500 to be paid for weekend stays (Friday to Sunday). All other stay dates will be subject to a deposit payment of £200. To complete the reservation process and obtain additional information, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking.

Message.Text:
Room No: 1

The minimum age of guests to check in is 18 years if unaccompanied by an adult.,When booking for 5 or more rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.,Baby cot is available at an additional charge.,A sofa bed can be provided for an additional guest and twin beds can also be requested. Kindly use the Special Requests section upon booking for any requests, which will be subject to availability.,All special requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.,A minimum credit card security deposit of GBP 200 on weekdays and GBP 500 on weekends are required upon check-in for charges or damages during the stay and will be refunded upon departure.
The property will pre-authorize the provided credit card.
Credit cards without a chip and PIN are not accepted at the property.

The pre-authorization acts as a security hold in the event of any of the following occurrences:
- A Breach in the terms and conditions explicitly stated on property website
- Any breakages, damages, or missing items within the apartment
- Any excessive cleaning above the normal level of cleaning expected due to the apartment being left in an unacceptable state of cleanliness,Security deposit will be charged upon check-in and will be refunded within 10 business days after departure. In case there is any damage, the security deposit will not be refunded or will be partially refunded.,An additional charge will be applied if the number of guests at check-in is more than the number of persons in the booking.,The property has a strict no-party policy.,The property has a strict no-gathering policy.,Failure to check-in by 09:00 AM on the following day after check-in day, without prior notification that guests are intend to arrive at a later date, may result in the reservation being cancelled.,Please note that images are for illustrative purposes and the actual apartment may differ slightly.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
